formalText: The client was referred up from the emergency room.
They were brought in by ambulance last night after they cut their arms and overdosed on Tylenol.
She says she was never suicidal and she wants to leave.
She wishes someone would help her.
She says she might binge eat and spend but she doesn't drink or do drugs.
Sometimes she cuts herself to feel the pain and release it in the past, she cuts too deep but got stitched up.
She has needed her arm to be stitched up and her stomach pumped a few times.
She has taken Depakote and Geodon and Abilify.
She did dialectical behavioral therapy and she didn't find it helpful.
She wants to see Carl, her boyfriend.
They have been dating for a couple of months and they been living together for the last four and a half weeks.
Her mom died when she was 4 and her dad is a drunk.
